correct_order: This site contains a comprehensive listing of the works of Norbert Elias, a German sociologist.
The site lists not only his published books and articles but also manuscripts and oral communications, in a variety of media and including reprints and translations.
The material has been catalogued, cross-referenced and organized by date.
There is, however, no search facility.

sources: This site contains a comprehensive listing of the works of Norbert Elias, a German sociologist.

There is, however, no search facility.
